column1: 1.2b -  Correcting for H, dominant trees have lowest Rt.
1.3 - There is a negative interactive effect between height and TWI.
2.1a - Wood density correlates negatively to Rt.
2.1b - Leaf mass per area correlates positively to Rt.
2.1c - Ring-porous species have higher Rt than diffuse- or semi-ring- porous.
2.1d  - Percent loss leaf area upon desiccation (PLA) correlates negatively with Rt.
2.1e - Turgor loss point correlates negatively with Rt.
